original_text: Jehoshaphat lived in the good way that his father Asa had lived. He only did things that the Lord says are right. But he did not remove all the altars that were on the hills. People continued to offer sacrifices on those altars and they continued to burn incense there.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 그의 아버지 아사의 모든 길로 행하며 돌이키지 아니하고 여호와 앞에서 정직히 행하였으나 산당은 폐하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 아직도 산당에서 제사를 드리며 분향하였더라

sentences.original_text: Jehoshaphat lived in the good way
that his father Asa had lived
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 아사가 살았던 길을 따랐다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord says are right
But he did not remove all the altars
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 모든 제단을 제거하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: and they continued to burn incense there
